dublinCore.dc:title: 113 SJ 39 IS: Relating to the approval of the proposed Agreement for Cooperation Between the Government of the United States of America and the Government of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam Concerning the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Reid (by request) introduced the following joint resolution; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations

form.official-title: Relating to the approval of the proposed Agreement for Cooperation Between the Government of the United States of America and the Government of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam Concerning the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy.

section.text: That the Congress does favor the proposed agreement for cooperation transmitted to the Congress by the President on May 8, 2014.
